item.title: Scrum Snippet
item.description: Tip for new JIRA UI, you can type username to do quick filter user name by alphabeta order - abirrell - acaron - bzhu - cengsstrom 🐞 - dsoloviev - gkankava - hhussein - izenbaei - jlee - jlau - lesposo - larabuli - mrivet - pteng - shshah - twang 🐞 - vho
